problem_text_cn: 如图,在五边形ABCDE中,∠A+∠B+∠E=300°,DP,CP分别平分∠EDC,∠BCD,则∠P的度数是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the pentagon ABCDE, ∠A + ∠B + ∠E = N_0, DP, CP bisect ∠EDC, ∠BCD, then the degree of ∠P is ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:∵在五边形ABCDE中,∠A+∠B+∠E=300°,∴∠EDC+∠BCD=240°,又∵DP、CP分别平分∠EDC、∠BCD,∴∠PDC+∠PCD=120°,∴△CDP中,∠P=180°-(∠PDC+∠PCD)=180°-120°=60°．
raw_comment: 本题主要考查了多边形的内角和以及角平分线的定义,解题时注意:多边形内角和=(n-2)\cdot180°(n≥3且n为整数)．
